entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
